name: LAZY ARCHER PC
description:
AS CITY GUARD YOUR DUTY IS TO GUARD THE CITY GATE BUT AS YOU ARE LAZY CHARACTER YOU LEFT YOUR DUTY AND WENT TO TAKE A NAP IN THE FOREST FOR YOUR BAD LUCK WAVES OF MONSTERS ATTACKED THE CITY AND NOW YOU HAVE TO REMEMBER YOUR TRAINING TO DEFEND THE PEOPLE OF THE CITY.

 FIRE ARROW KILL WATER ELEMENT MONSTERS AND WATER ARROW KILL FIRE ELEMENT MONSTERS, THIS IS WHAT YOU WERE TOLD IN THE TRAINING.

NOW IT IS YOUR TIME, WILL YOU BE CITY HERO OR YOU WILL BE THE REASON OF THE CITY FALL.
